# Changelog

# 1.2.0

- Don't change method visibility of `#lookup` (#8, @aleksandrs-ledovskis)

## 1.1.1

- Update i18n version
- Make Rails logger check more robust

## 1.1.0

- Use `Module#prepend` instead of aliasing methods.
- Allow hook to be defined as a block to `#on_lookup`.

## 1.0.0

- Initial release
